fullText:
Bloodied Boon

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Warlock, Eldritch Pact class feature, Warlock’s Curse class feature
Benefit: You can choose to gain your pact boon when an enemy you curse is first bloodied. If you do so, you remove your curse from that enemy.

Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 30.
